document.full_text: industrial and consumer goods conglomerate 3m co reported higher-than-expected quarterly profit on tuesday, helped by sales to emerging markets, and raised its full-year profit forecast.
document.title: china, india lift 3m profit above expectations
lines_and_colors: industrial and consumer goods conglomerate 3m co reported higher-than-expected quarterly profit on tuesday, helped by sales to emerging markets, and raised its full-year profit forecast.
